item.title: Justin add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Justin add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I don't know half of you half as well as I should like; and I like less than half of you half as well as you deserve." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Justin add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "A man that flies from his fear may find that he has only taken a short cut to meet it." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Justin add a quote by Frank Herbert
item.description: "I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration. I will face my fear. I will permit it to pass over me and through me. And when it has gone past I will turn the inner eye to see its path. Where the fear has gone there will be nothing. Only I will remain." -- Frank Herbert

item.title: Justin add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "Two people in love, alone, isolated from the world, that's beautiful." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Justin add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "Living is being happy: seeing, hearing, touching, drinking, eating, urinating, defecating, diving into the water and gazing at the sky, laughing and crying." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Justin add a quote by Anne Rice
item.description: "Goodnight sweet prince, may flights of devils wing you to your rest." -- Anne Rice

item.title: Justin add a quote by Anne Rice
item.description: "None of us really changes over time. We only become more fully what we are." -- Anne Rice

item.title: Justin add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Justin add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Get busy living or get busy dying." -- Stephen King

item.title: Justin add a quote by Robert Bloch
item.description: "Despite my ghoulish reputation, I really have the heart of a small boy. I keep it in a jar on my desk." -- Robert Bloch

item.title: Justin add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "Anything that just costs money is cheap." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Justin add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "Never think that war, no matter how necessary, nor how justified, is not a crime." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Justin add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "Death is like an old whore in a bar--I'll buy her a drink but I won't go upstairs with her" -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Justin add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no oneâ€™s definition of your life; define yourself." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Justin add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "These woods are lovely, dark and deep, But I have promises to keep, And miles to go before I sleep, And miles to go before I sleep." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Justin add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "The best way out is always through." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Justin add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "Half the world is composed of people who have something to say and can't, and the other half who have nothing to say and keep on saying it." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Justin add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Life is a disease: sexually transmitted, and invariably fatal." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Justin add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Justin add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Justin add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Justin add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "A clever person solves a problem. A wise person avoids it." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Justin add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I have no special talents. I am only passionately curious." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Justin add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Justin add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Game shows are designed to make us feel better about the random, useless facts that are all we have left of our education." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Justin add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "In a world where billions believe their deity conceived a mortal child with a virgin human, it's stunning how little imagination most people display." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Justin add a quote by Louis Armstrong
item.description: "All music is folk music. I ain't never heard a horse sing a song." -- Louis Armstrong

item.title: Justin add a quote by W.E.B. DuBois
item.description: "There is but one coward on earth, and that is the coward that dare not know." -- W.E.B. DuBois

item.title: Justin add a quote by W.E.B. DuBois
item.description: "Children learn more from what you are than what you teach." -- W.E.B. DuBois
